figure_1.title: FIGURE 1.
figure_1.caption: Flow diagram of the identification of articles on couple and family interventions (2010â€“2019) to include in review. Note: *Results by condition include duplicate articles between conditions. Figure adapted from: Page et al. (2021). ADHD, attention-deficit/hyperactivity disorder

claims.sentence: Further examination revealed 15 duplicate records, yielding a final total of 271 different articles for inclusion in this review (see Figure 1).
The results are depicted in Figure 2a.

Figure 2b presents additional data.Attention to race/ethnicity in studies with diverse samples
To address our second research question, we more closely examined the articles (n = 60) describing research conducted in the US with predominantly racial/ethnic minority samples to assess how frequently these studies included considerations relevant to diverse populations.
Further examination revealed 15 duplicate records, yielding a final total of 271 different articles for inclusion in this review (see Figure 1).
The results are depicted in Figure 2a.
